verses.text: It \w is|strong="G4851"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w expedient|strong="G4851"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w doubtless|strong="G1211"\w* to \w glory|strong="G2744"\w*. I will \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w visions|strong="G3701"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w revelations|strong="G0602"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

I \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w above|strong="G4253"\w* \w fourteen|strong="G1180"\w* years \w ago|strong="G2094"\w*, (\w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w I|strong="G1492"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w tell|strong="G1492"\w*; or \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* out \w of|strong="G1622"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w I|strong="G1492"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w tell|strong="G1492"\w*: \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w*;) such an \w one|strong="G5108"\w* caught \w up|strong="G0726"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, (\w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* out \w of|strong="G1622"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w I|strong="G1492"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w tell|strong="G1492"\w*: \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w*;)

How \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he was caught \w up|strong="G0726"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w paradise|strong="G3857"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w unspeakable|strong="G0731"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* it \w is|strong="G1832"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* for a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* to \w utter|strong="G2980"\w*.

\w Of|strong="G5228"\w* such an \w one|strong="G5108"\w* will I \w glory|strong="G2744"\w*: \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w* I \w will|strong="G2744"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w glory|strong="G2744"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w mine|strong="G3450"\w* \w infirmities|strong="G0769"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w though|strong="G1437"\w* I would \w desire|strong="G2309"\w* to \w glory|strong="G2744"\w*, I \w shall|strong="G2071"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G2071"\w* a \w fool|strong="G0878"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I will \w say|strong="G2046"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \add now\add* I \w forbear|strong="G5339"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* should \w think|strong="G3049"\w* \w of|strong="G1519"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w* \w above|strong="G5228"\w* that \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w seeth|strong="G0991"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \add to be\add*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \add that\add* he \w heareth|strong="G0191"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w lest|strong="G2443"\w* I should be exalted above \w measure|strong="G5229"\w* through the \w abundance|strong="G5236"\w* of the \w revelations|strong="G0602"\w*, there was \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w* a \w thorn|strong="G4647"\w* in the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, the \w messenger|strong="G0032"\w* of \w Satan|strong="G4566"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w buffet|strong="G2852"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, \w lest|strong="G2443"\w* I should be exalted above \w measure|strong="G5229"\w*.

\w For|strong="G5228"\w* this \w thing|strong="G5127"\w* I \w besought|strong="G3870"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w thrice|strong="G5151"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* it might \w depart|strong="G0868"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2046"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \wj  \+w My|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w grace|strong="G5485"\+w* \+w is sufficient|strong="G0714"\+w* \+w for thee|strong="G4671"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w strength|strong="G1411"\+w* \+w is made perfect|strong="G5048"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w weakness|strong="G0769"\+w*.\wj* Most \w gladly|strong="G2236"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* will \w I|strong="G2744"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w infirmities|strong="G0769"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* may \w rest|strong="G1981"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1352"\w* I take \w pleasure|strong="G2106"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w infirmities|strong="G0769"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w reproaches|strong="G5196"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w necessities|strong="G0318"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w persecutions|strong="G1375"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w distresses|strong="G4730"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w Christâ€™s sake|strong="G5547"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* I am \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*, \w then|strong="G5119"\w* am \w I|strong="G1510"\w* \w strong|strong="G1415"\w*.

I am \w become|strong="G1096"\w* a \w fool|strong="G0878"\w* in \w glorying|strong="G2744"\w*; \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* have \w compelled|strong="G0315"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w ought|strong="G3784"\w* to have been \w commended|strong="G4921"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* in \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* am I \w behind|strong="G5302"\w* the \w very|strong="G5228"\w* \w chiefest|strong="G3029"\w* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*, \w though|strong="G1487"\w* I \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w Truly|strong="G3303"\w* the \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* of an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* were \w wrought|strong="G2716"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* mighty \w deeds|strong="G1411"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* it \w wherein|strong="G3739"\w* ye were \w inferior|strong="G2274"\w* \w to|strong="G5228"\w* \w other|strong="G3062"\w* \w churches|strong="G1577"\w*, \w except|strong="G1487"\w* \add it be\add* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w myself|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G2655"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w burdensome|strong="G2655"\w* to \w you|strong="G5216"\w*? \w forgive|strong="G5483"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w wrong|strong="G0093"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the third \w time|strong="G5154"\w* I \w am|strong="G2192"\w* \w ready|strong="G2093"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w will|strong="G2655"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be \w burdensome|strong="G2655"\w* to \w you|strong="G5216"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w yours|strong="G5216"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w ought|strong="G3784"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to lay \w up|strong="G2343"\w* for the \w parents|strong="G1118"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w parents|strong="G1118"\w* for the \w children|strong="G5043"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* will very \w gladly|strong="G2236"\w* \w spend|strong="G1159"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w spent|strong="G1550"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*; \w though|strong="G1487"\w* the more \w abundantly|strong="G4056"\w* I \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, the \w less|strong="G2276"\w* I be \w loved|strong="G0025"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* be it \w so|strong="G2077"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w did|strong="G2599"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w burden|strong="G2599"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*: \w nevertheless|strong="G0235"\w*, \w being|strong="G5225"\w* \w crafty|strong="G3835"\w*, I \w caught|strong="G2983"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* with \w guile|strong="G1388"\w*.

\w Did|strong="G3361"\w* I make a \w gain|strong="G4122"\w* \w of|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5209"\w*?

I \w desired|strong="G3870"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4882"\w* \add him\add* I \w sent|strong="G4882"\w* a \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*. \w Did|strong="G3361"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w* make a \w gain|strong="G4122"\w* of \w you|strong="G5209"\w*? walked \w we|strong="G4043"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* in the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*? \add walked we\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* in the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w steps|strong="G2487"\w*?

\w Again|strong="G3825"\w*, think \w ye|strong="G1380"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we excuse \w ourselves|strong="G0626"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*? we \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w before|strong="G2714"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \add we do\add* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, dearly \w beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w edifying|strong="G3619"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w fear|strong="G5399"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3381"\w*, when I \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, I \w shall|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* such \w as|strong="G3634"\w* I \w would|strong="G2309"\w*, \w and|strong="G2504"\w* \add that\add* \w I|strong="G2504"\w* shall be \w found|strong="G2147"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* such \w as|strong="G3634"\w* ye \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: \w lest|strong="G3381"\w* \add there be\add* \w debates|strong="G2054"\w*, \w envyings|strong="G2205"\w*, \w wraths|strong="G2372"\w*, \w strifes|strong="G2052"\w*, \w backbitings|strong="G2636"\w*, \w whisperings|strong="G5587"\w*, \w swellings|strong="G5450"\w*, \w tumults|strong="G0181"\w*:

\add And\add* \w lest|strong="G3361"\w*, when I \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* will \w humble|strong="G5013"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* I shall \w bewail|strong="G3996"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* have sinned \w already|strong="G4258"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G3340"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w repented|strong="G3340"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* the \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lasciviousness|strong="G0766"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they have \w committed|strong="G4238"\w*.
